maie expelled contrarie holsome strength medicine medicine none beside bodythe christ medicine declared aboue death cause saluatio litle leauen saith apostle maketh whole lump dow like self body made necessarie nature much lieth receaue yt healthfull strength within body seing none thing beside diuine body christ hath receaued grace heale sicknes seing hath ben shewed body attein immortality saith father thinke selues able plant new faith according vnderstanding whiche conceaue god worde chefe way antichrist preua le preaching nine hundred yeres saith many christian country may dispised consequently new religion sought deuising whereof ye may sure deuil president cousel come purpose antichrist aduanced selfe aboue idol therefore shall set vp idoll besides self consequently pope although bean obiection antichrist selfe answere euery lymme antichristthe swere like head rest body whereof lymme antichrist professeth selfe aduersary christ goeth diminish honour pope professeth christ eaten faith meate al comon yea catechumeni may eate christ neither receaued body old fa thers yt catechumeni lern faith corporall meate true manna faithfull baptized isexod lesse really taken mouthes vnder forme bread iewes really eate manna fortie yeres together desert iuel euery faithfull man made partaker body andapud dam cor blood christ baptism while findeth vnity signified sacrament therefore faithfull eate christes body otherwise sacrament sand denieth christes body may otherwise aten sacrament therfore eaten really harding affirmed proue otherwise eaten yet eating whereof augustine beda spake proueth real eating harding defendeth body christ self vnder form bread baptized partake sacrament christes supper neither partaketh baptism bread wine made member mysticall body sacrament signified signified let v heare augustine expounding vnto v speaking heretiks schismatiks church saith non sunt eo vinculo pacis quod illo exprimitur de ciuit l c sacramento bond peace hard saying iuel reason hangeth thus capharnaites vnderstodethe vntruthe christ ergo body really sacrament sander syr thus vnderstode christ speake without parable christes word appertin sacrament sayd therefore body really sacrament ark word capharnaites shal finde answer demand vnderstood christ promised beleued thing either possible conuenient therefore christ sayd beleue sayd saith worthy also reall eating sacrament christes supper self thereof speaketh promising ge e supper gaue really spiritually say grosse maner diuinely miraculously whereof ye may see third booke xix xx spiritually fourthly nameth quamlibet terram earth calling sh christ earth saying adore earth manisesily declareth speaketh adoration made diuerse place altar whereas otherwise flesh christ heaue one earth one place thing presupposed place augustine iuel allegeth olow augustine meant christes flesh eaten bodily mouth sacrum ment also adored therefore sayth ye shall eate body see meaneth ye shall eate suche forme see mortall quantitie corruptible sort meant ye shall eate substance body iuel taketh augustine owne word clean contrarie selues cause alleged besyde great dissembling iuel knew word augustine yet wold haue tra consydered hath also misordered misenglished diuerse word hath translated commendaui geue whereas sacrament yet deliuered commended set foorth word vnto iewes christ sayd bread geue flesh commendare latine geue yet haue bene translated haue geuen viuificabit iuel readeth viuificat doth geue life shall geue life oth haue commendation past geuing life come wold antecedent vnproued sand sayd christ take eate body say euangelists gaue vnto apostle antecedent vnproued iuel father call sacrament figure token signess ij vntruthe image caet therefore christes word may taken metaphore trope figure san standeth well together signe truthe christ image god yet also god highercolos euery signe image lesse differeth truth therefore figure christes body blood differeth form substance christ self albeit sacrum ment figure yet word body trop call vnproper iuel euen dun saw folowing bare letter mustdoutfull nedes say bread christes body san thinke man doth beleue without allegi g place haue abused many father already row sped much time reading dun know iuel word stand bread bodythe vntruthe san stand writen place ghospell bread body yet say word stand think ghospell surely iuel sa meant bread one certeinthe vntruthe thing generall san haue shewed taken booke chapiter signifie bread meanes neither doth signifie generall say signifieth conteined vnder forme bread iuel est expound erit shalbethe vntruthe san shameful pleasure man hath falshod beleue christ toke word est consecrate hischryso body withall word signifieth presenthom ad pop thing
